title: Breaking: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Overtakes the Largest Silver Trust with $10B AuM
description:
Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) based on Bitcoin are rapidly moving up the commodity ETFs leaderboard, knocking out the largest silver trusts, with the largest gold trusts next in line. Recent statistics released by HODL15Capital reveal a significant milestone for crypto, noting that Bitcoin spot ETFs have surpassed Silver ETFs in asset management size.  In particular, BlackRock’s […]
